Title: Opening a Xiaohongshu Store
Content: To open a store on Xiaohongshu, follow these steps: Navigate to your profile by clicking 'Me' at the bottom right. Then, click the three lines at the top left and select 'Creator Center.' Choose 'More Services' and then 'Open Store.' Select 'Personal Store' and proceed to the next step. Choose 'Ordinary Goods' and click 'Next.' You will need to upload your identification information, including your name, ID number, and address. Complete the facial recognition process and submit your information. Once confirmed, your store will be successfully opened. Next, click 'Manage My Store' to set up logistics information, including your shipping method and address. Create a new address with your contact details and save it. Set up your logistics template by naming it according to the product you are selling. Finally, configure your business type and company information, ensuring all necessary fields are filled out. Pay the required deposit using Alipay for convenience. After payment, your store will be ready to publish products.

Title: Setting Up Logistics Information
Content: After opening your Xiaohongshu store, the next step is to set up logistics information. This involves configuring your shipping method and address. Start by clicking 'Manage My Store' and then 'Set Logistics Information.' Create a new address by entering your contact details, including name, country, detailed address, and phone number. Save this information. Next, set up your logistics template by naming it according to the product you are selling, such as 'Women's Slippers.' Ensure that the address is correctly saved and linked to your logistics template. This setup is crucial for ensuring that your products are shipped efficiently and reach your customers without any issues. Proper logistics setup helps in managing orders and maintaining customer satisfaction.

Title: Configuring Business and Payment Information
Content: Configuring your business and payment information is essential for running a successful Xiaohongshu store. Start by setting up your business type and company information. Enter your contact details, including phone number and business address. Select all relevant business categories to avoid issues later. Submit this information and proceed to the deposit payment. Use Alipay for a quick and convenient transaction. After paying the deposit, configure your payment account by entering your bank details, including the bank name and branch. Ensure all information is accurate to avoid payment issues. Once completed, your store is ready to publish products and start selling. Proper configuration of business and payment information ensures smooth transactions and helps in building trust with your customers.
